txt.en: Kindred with the Elves of Rivendell
All you have done for the Elves of Rivendell has earned a sincere bond of friendship that gives you great respect among them.
You must earn Kindred standing with the Elves of Rivendell
In Rivendell, the Elves consider you to be one of their dearest allies, friends, and confidants. Few others have ever earned the trust that you now possess.
